4:(二)、方志
4:
4:1.明・王廷稷，《營山縣志》，《天一閣藏明代方志選刊續編》67，上海：上海書店，1990年12月第1版，據明萬曆刻本影印。
4:2.明・陳時宜等，《潼川州志》，臺北：國家圖書館，1990年，據日本國會圖書館明萬曆47年（1619）刊本影印。
4:3.明・馮任等，《天啟．新修成都府志》，《中國地方志集成》四川府縣志輯1，成都：巴蜀書社，1992年8月第1版，據1962年熊承顯抄本影印。
4:4.明・盧懷忠等，《萬曆．四川總志》，《四庫全書存目叢書》史部199，臺南：莊嚴文化事業有限公司， 1996年6 月初版，據北京圖書館藏明萬曆刻本影印。
4:5.清・文棨等，《同治．直隸綿州志》，《中國地方志集成》四川府縣志輯16，成都：巴蜀書社，1992年8月第1版，據清同治12年（1873）刻本影印。
4:6.清・王夢庚等，《道光．重慶府志》，《中國地方志集成》四川府縣志輯5，成都：巴蜀書社，1992年8月第1版，據清道光23年（1843）刻本影印。
4:7.清・朱言詩等，《光緒．梁山縣志》，《中國地方志集成》四川府縣志輯54，成都：巴蜀書社，1992年8月第1版，據清光緒20年（1894）刻本影印。
4:8.清・朱襄虞等，《內江縣志》，《新修方志叢刊》四川方志22，臺北：臺灣學生書局，1968年3月初版，據清宣統3年（1911）修1925年重刊景印本影印。
4:9.清・佚名，《江津縣鄉土志》，《四川大學圖書館藏珍稀四川地方志叢刊》3，成都：巴蜀書社，2009年9月第1版，據清光緒末抄本影印。

4:(二)、期刊

4:5.王海剛，〈明代圖書出版體系探析〉，《山東圖書館學刊》，2009年第2期，頁28-31。

4:8.王蕾，〈明清時期藏書樓建築保護思想研究〉，《圖書館工作與研究》，2013年第2期，頁63-67。

4:11.朱元軍，〈略論明代商品經濟發展各階段對詩歌的影響〉，《赤峰學院學報》漢文哲學社會科學版，2010年第9期，頁90-91。

4:14.位聰聰，〈明代私刻對編輯出版史的影響〉，《新聞傳播》，2013年第3期，頁32。
4:15.余述淳，〈試論中國古代私家藏書對文化典籍傳播的貢獻〉，《河南圖書館學刊》，2004年第1期，頁78-81。

4:二、　古籍史料

4:（二）期刊、會議論文

4:二、英文部分
4:（一）圖書
4:1. Case, O. Donald. Looking for Information: A Survey of Research on Information Seeking, Needs, and Behavior. New York: Academic Press, 2002.
4:2. Couch, Nena., and Allen, Nancy. The Humanities and The Library. Forword by Couch, Nena. Chicago: American Library Association, 1993.
4:3. Feather, John., and Sturges, Paul. International Encyclopedia Information and Library Science. London: Routledge, 2003.
4:4. Kelly, George A. A Theory of Personality: The Psychology of Personal Constructs. New York: W. W. Norton, 1963.
4:5. Kuhlthau, C. Carol. Seeking meaning : a process approach to library and information Services. Westport: Libraries Unlimited, 2004.
4:6. Line, B. Maurice. Academic Library Management. London: The Library Association, 1991.
4:7. Marchionini, M. Gary. Information Seeking in Electronic Environments. Cambridge New York: Cambridge University Press, 1995.
4:8. Reitz, M. Joan. Dictionary for Library and Information Science . Wesport: Libraries Unlimited, 2004.
4:9. Ron, Blazek., and Aversa, Elizabeth. The Humanities: A Selective Guild to Information Sources. Englewood: Libraries Unlimited, 2000.
4:10. Rosenberg, C. Kenyon., and J. Elsbree, John. Dictionary of Library and Educational Technology. Englewood: Libraries Unlimited , 1989.
4:11. Schelling, W. J. Freidrich. The Philosophy of Art. Minnesota: University of Minnesota press, 1989.

4:（二）期刊
4:1. Anderson, J. Claire.; Glassman, Myron .; Bruce Mcaffe, R.; and Pinelli, Thomas, ”An investigation of factors affecting how engineers and scientists seek information,”Journal of Engineering and Technology Management 18（2001）: 131-155.
4:2. Artmonova, N. Svetlana, ”How the Collections of Graphic Arts in the Russian State Library Serve the Needs of Artists, ” Art Libraries Journal 20: 2(1995): 28-29.
4:3. Barrett, Andy, “The Information-seeking Habits of Graduated Student Researches in the Humanities, ” The Journal of Academic Librarianship 31:4(July 2005):324-331.
4:4. Belkin, Nicholas J., “Anomalous State of Knowledge for Information Retrieval,”The Canadian Journal of Information Science 5(1980): 133-143.
4:5. Belkin, Nicholas J., Odde, Robert N., and Brooks, Henry M., “Ask for Information Retrieval: Part I. Background and Theory,” Journal of Documentation 38:2(1982): 61-71.
4:6. BroadBent, Elaine, “A Study of Humanities Faculty Library Information Seeking Behavior, ” Cataloging and Classification Quarterly 6:3(Spring 1986): 23-38.
4:7. Budd, M. John, ”Research in the two Culture: the nature of scholarship in science and the humanities,” Collection Management 1: 3/4(1989): 1-21.
4:8. Cobbledick, Susie, ”The Information behavior of Artist: Exploratory Interviews,”The Library Quarterly 66: 4(1996): 343-370.
4:9. Cowan, Sandra, “Informing Visual Poetry: Information Needs and Sources of Artists, ” Art Documentation 23: 2(2004): 14-20.
4:10. Deer, L. Richard, “ A Conceptual Analysis of Information Need,” Information Processing and Management 19: 5(1983): 273-278.
4:11. Dervin, Brenda, ” On studying information seeking methodologically: the implications of connecting metatheory to method,” Information Process and Management 35(1999): 727-750.
4:12. Duff, M. Wendy., and Johnson, A. Catherine, “Accidentally Found on Purpose: Information-seeking Behavior of Historian in Archives,” The Library Quarterly 72: 4(October 2002): 472-496.
4:13. Ellis, David, “A Behavioural Model for Information Retrieval System Design,”Journal of Information Science 15(1989): 237-248.
4:14. Ellis, David.; Cox, Deborah.; and Hall, Katherine, “A comparison of the information seeking patterns of researchers in the physical and social sciences,” Journal of Documentation 49:4(October 1993): 356-369.
4:15. Frank, Polly, ”Student Artists in the Library: An Investigation of How They Use General Academic Libraries For Their Creative Needs, ” Journal of Academic Librarianship 25(November 1999): 445-455.
4:16. Garfield, Eugene, “Is Information Retrieval In The Arts and Humanities Inherently Different From That In Science? The Effect That ISI’s Citation Index For The Arts and Humanities Is Expected to Have On Future Scholarship,” Library Quarterly 50:1(1980）: 41-57.
4:17. Gericke, M. Elizabeth, “Information-seeking Patterns of Artists and Art Scholars at the Vall Triangle Technikon,” South African Journal of Library & Information Science 66: 1(1998): 23-33.
4:18. Grover, Robert, “A Proposed Model for Diagnosing Information Needs,” School Library Media Quarterly 21:2(Winter 1993): 95-100.
4:19. Guest, S. Susan, “The Use of Bibliographic Tools by Humanities Faculty at the State University of New York at Albany, ” Reference Librarian 18（Summer 1987）: 157-171.
4:20. Hertzum, Morten., and Mark Pejtersen, Annelise, “ The Information-Seeking Practices of Engineers: Searching for Documents As Well As for People,”Information Processing and Management 36:5（2000）: 761-778.

4:一、中文部份
4:（一）圖書

4:六、網路電子資料
4:
3:1.清‧姚鼐。《惜抱軒書錄》。收錄於東京大學東洋文化研究所所藏漢籍善本全文影像資料庫，大木叢書部53，編號1716。

==============================
129
4:一、中文書目
4:(一)圖書

4:二、西文書目
4:(一)圖書

4:中文
4:一、圖書

4:英文
4:一、圖書
4:Auger, Charles P. Information sources in grey literature, 4th ed. LondonNew Providence, N.J.: Bowker-Saur, 1998.
4:Burke, Maria E. and Hazel Hall. Navigating business infromation sources: a practical guide for information managers. London: Library Association, 1998.
4:Buxbaum, Shari. Library services for business students in distance education: issues and trends. New York: Haworth Information Press, 2002.
4:Czinkota,Michael R., Ilkka A. Ronkainen and Michael H. Moffett. International business, 5th ed. Fort Worth: Dryden Press, c1999.
4:Europa Publication Limitd. The Europa world year book, 30th ed. London, England: Europa Publications Limited, 2004.
4:Lanza,Sheri R. and Barbara Gilder Quint. International business information on the web: searcher magazine's guide to sites and strategies for global business research. Medford, NJ: CyberAge Books, 2001.
4:Lowe, Michael. Business information at work. London: Aslib, 1999.
4:Matarazzo, James M. and Suzanne D. Connolly. Knowledge and special libraries. Boston: Butterworth-Heinemann, 1999.
4:McDaniel,Carl D. and Roger H. Gates. Contemporary marketing research, 4th ed. Cincinnati: South-Western College Publishing, 1999.
4:Monrozier, Bertrand Jocteur and Vidhu Sood. Guide to sources of information on importers. Geneva: International Trade Centre UNCTAD/WTO, 2002.
4:Monrozier, Bertrand Jocteur, Robert Heeley and Vidhu Sood. Survey on web dissemination of trade information . Geneva: International Trade Centre UNCTAD/WTO, 2002.
4:Monrozier, Bertrand Jocteur. Trade information dissemination: options for consulting, disseminating and exchanging trade information . Geneva: International Trade Centre UNCTAD/WTO, 2001.
4:Mort, David. Business information handbook. Munchen: K. G. Saur, c2003.
4:Moss, Rita W. and Diane Wheeler Strauss. Strauss’s handbook of business information: a guide for librarians, students, and researchers, 2nd ed. Westport: Libraries Unlimited, 2004.
4:Pagell, Ruth A. and Michael Halperin. International business information：how to find it, how to use it , 2 nd ed. Phoenix: The Oryx Press, 1998.
4:Powell, Ronalds R. Basic Research Methods for Librarians, 3 rd ed. Greenwich, Connecticut: Ablex Publishing, 1997.

4:一、中文部分
4:（一）圖書
1:丁崑健、王美鴻、朱淑卿、張惠美（民85）。圖書館利用教育之規劃研究。新竹市：國立交通大學圖書館。

1:林美和（民84）。圖書館利用指導。在圖書館學與資訊科學大辭典（下冊，頁2046-2047）。臺北市：漢美。

4:（二）期刊
2:王巧燕、曾惠明（民90，3月）。圖書館利用教育實施之評估：以大仁技術學院專科部藥學科為例。教育資料與圖書館學，38（3），287-308。
